about_the_game:
Put Official version in Wishlist now！



Backrooms:Beyond one year(Prologue) is a individual prologue about official version 《Backrooms:Beyond one year》
You can play a small part of content in official version here.



Since Backrooms became known to the world, within a year, a large number of companies, groups, and wanderers have been seeking opportunities to enter the Backrooms, searching for treasures, occupying land, and obtaining huge profits!



the player is an individual wanderer, entering the back room through the emerging company - Wanderer Union Limited. In the midst of mystery and danger, they collect supplies, establish outposts, and earn profits!



Prologue Game elements:

■ Free exploration for first 10 levels in Backrooms (there are more levels in Official version), explore and discover interesting things freely in the multi-layered open world of the backrooms!

■ Collect materials! There are many interesting garbage and treasures in the backrooms. If you can trade them in the real world, you can exchange them for a lot of money!

■ Establish an outpost! In this dangerous world, brave wanderers are needed to establish outposts, so that tired people can have a place to rest!

Thank you for playing & please wishlist our official Version!

name: 后室：彼阳的晚意(序章)-Backrooms:Beyond one year(Prologue)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows® 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

short_description: 《Backrooms:Beyond one year(Prologue)》 Scientists found a new,scary,huge new world named"Backrooms",then a large number of enterprises, groups, and individuals wanderers are rushing into this world. Nothing stops humanity's desire !You are going to make some money with them....
